title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
heading: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
description: Please enter the 6-digit code generated by your Google Authenticator app.
label: 2FA Verification Code
instruction_steps: 1. Open the Google Authenticator app on your phone.
2. Look for the 6-digit code next to UAP Immo.
3. Enter that code below to access your account.
⚠️ Warning: The code expires every 30 seconds.
